Package org.openremote.entities.panel.version1

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbsoluteLayout
    Absolute layout that can contain one widget and is positioned relative to the top left of the containing screen.
    ButtonWidget
    Button widget that sends a command on press (behaves differently depending on the ButtonWidget.Type); simply change state to trigger the send behaviour.
    CellLayout
    Cell layout used inside a grid layout; cell can contain one widget and is positioned within the grid by column, row, columnspan and rowspan properties
    Gesture
    The screen gesture, which contains 4 swipe types: "top-to-bottom", "bottom-to-top", "left-to-right" and "right-to-left".
    GridLayout
    Grid layout that contains cells; grid is positioned relative to the top left of the containing screen
    Group
    Group is parsed by group node, which contains id, name, screens and tabBar.
    ImageWidget
    An image widget capable of dynamically changing the image based on a sensor value.
    LabelWidget
    The label can set font size and color, and text can be linked to a sensor (i.e.
    Navigation
    Forwards to screen or do other logical functions.
    Panel
    Contains the entire definition of a panel
    PanelDefinitionJSONTest  
    Screen
    Screen object that contains layouts and supports gestures
    ScreenBackground
    The background of screen, which contains background position in screen.
    SensorLink
    Defines a link to a sensor and defines the List to use
    SensoryWidget
    Base class for widgets that are capable of connecting to sensors.
    SliderWidget
    Slider widget for displaying an integer value on an interactive or passive slider.
    SwitchWidget
    Switch widget is capable of sending an alternating on/off command and is capable of feeding back its' current state based on a sensor value.
    TabBar
    The tabBar contains any number of TabBarItem objects.
    TabBarItem
    Tab Bar Item can be used for navigation to other screens
    WebViewWidget
    An iFrame for displaying a web page on a panel; src can be linked to a sensor and can dynamically change
    Widget
    Base class for all widgets.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ButtonWidget.State  
    ButtonWidget.Type  
    Gesture.GestureType  
    Navigation.SystemScreenType  
    ScreenBackground.RelativePosition  
    SliderWidget.State  
    SwitchWidget.State
